Szumik (Miguel Lillo Foundation, CONICET, Argentina).<br><br>PLACE: Facilities of the Centre of Restauraci\ufffd\ufffd i Interpretaci\ufffd\ufffd<br>Paleontologica, Els Hostalets de Pierola, Barcelona (Spain).<br><br>WEBPAGE AND REGISTRATION:<br>http://www.transmittingscience.org/courses/biog/historic-biogeography/<br><br>PROGRAM:<br><br>Topic 1. Historical Background: [...] Soledad De Esteban Trivigno 2014-12-02T17:27:45+01:00 2014-12-02T17:27:45+01:00 Course about Cladistic Analysis by Dr. Goloboff in Barcelona, Spain. https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=TARDIGRADA;2bc5e006.1412 Dear colleagues,<br><br>Registration is open for the workshop "QUANTITATIVE CLADISTICS AND USE OF<br>TNT - 2nd Edition", June 29 - July 3, 2015. Instructors: Dr. Goloboff and<br>Dr. Szumik (Conicet, Argentine).<br><br>PLACE: Facilities of the Centre de Restauraci\ufffd\ufffd i Interpretaci\ufffd\ufffd<br>Paleontologica, Els Hostalets de Pierola, Barcelona (Spain).<br><br>WEBPAGE: http://www.transmittingscience.org/courses/phylo/cladistics/<br><br>PROGRAM:<br><br>*- *Intro and Basics. Parsimony and phylogenetic systematics. Character<br>optimisation and mapping. Most parsimonious reconstructions and specific<br>changes. Input/output in TNT. Dataset formats. Using GB->TNT to create<br>matrices. Instruction files. Options for graphic output (SVG, metafiles).<br>Creation of \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdbatch\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd files. Editing trees. Handling tree files. Groups of<br>trees, characters and [...] Soledad De Esteban Trivigno 2014-11-24T12:09:36+01:00 2014-11-24T12:09:36+01:00 Course Introduction to Naturalistic and Scientific Illustration, May 18-22, Barcelona, Spain https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=TARDIGRADA;6bc56fb1.1411 Dear colleagues,<br><br>The second edition of the course "Introduction to Naturalistic and<br>Scientific Illustration" is already open.<br><br>DATES: May 18-22, 2015.<br><br>Instructor: Oscar Sanisidro (Museo Nacional de Ciencias Naturales- CSIC,<br>Spain).<br><br>Course webpage:<br>http://www.transmittingscience.org/courses/draw/scientific-illustration/<br><br>Site: Premises of Sabadell of the Institut Catal\ufffd\ufffd de Paleontologia Miquel<br>Crusafont (Barcelona, Spain).<br><br>PROGRAM:<br><br>- Scientific and naturalistic illustrations: Generalities and comparison.<br><br>- Scientific illustration versus photography.
